channel.title: Making a navigation bar

item.title: Making a navigation bar
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I KNOW MOST WEBSITES HAVE A NAVIGATION BAR ALREADY BUT, GUESS WHAT…MINE DON’T SO
I need help making a navigation bar for my website
I got the code:

[code]



NAVIGATION

LINK 1 HERE

LINK 2 HERE

LINK 3 HERE

LINK 4 HERE

LINK 5 HERE

a.box:link,a.box:visited, a.box:active{background-image:url(http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/6783/boxua6.png); -moz-box-sizing: border-box;filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Gradient(endColorstr='#ffffff', startColorstr='#c8c8c8', gradientType='1'); text-decoration : none; color : #888888; font-size : 7pt; font-family : comic sans ms; border-bottom:1px solid #999999; border-top:1px solid #ffffff; display:block;width: 185px; border-left:2px #c6c6c6 solid; border-right:1px #999999 solid;} } a.box:hover {background-image: url(http://img251.imageshack.us/img251/1518/boxre3.png) !important; -moz-box-sizing: border-box; text-transform:uppercase; style:italic; 
padding: 0px 0px 0px 0px;
color: #888888;
border-bottom:1px #ffffff solid ;	
border-top:1px solid #999999;
display:block ;
border-left:2px #999999 solid ;

border-right: 1px #ffffff solid;
}

[/code] But.. I kind of want it to look like this: [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/123456789.png[/img] I've already tried to changed the image link codes but when I close the box it still looks the same..Anyway was just wondering if anyone can help me fix this?Thanks :D Mupescape

Read full topic
